about_the_game:
Become the Prime Minister of one of many nations, each with its own strengths and weaknesses. You must keep your job by balancing the agenda of the various parties forming your coalition while also ensuring that your country stays healthy through various decisions. Will you pursue free market capitalism, install a planned economy with workers at the forefront, or strike a balance between the two? Will you form a brutal police state or pursue individual freedoms for all your citizens? The choice is yours...

By approving or vetoing Bills and Executive Orders from all sects of the political spectrum, you must ensure that values intrinsic to national health, such as the strength of the military and the quality of education, maintain balanced. You also need to make sure that you're doing enough to make the people want to keep your party in power.

Features:
- Over 200 Bills, Executive Orders, and Events, making each play through experience distinct
- 7 political parties to choose from, falling on all points of the political spectrum
- 4 nations with distinct advantages and disadvantages

name: Electoral Dynasty

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6200U CPU @ 2.30GHz 2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: A political-simulation watch-the-clock strategy game. Pass laws, executive orders, and deal with events, all while maintaining the balance of your nation's most important attributes. Will you manage to keep your coalition together or establish a dictatorship? Only you can decide, Prime Minister.
